stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  TEST HEAVY
comments: By far the worst teacher I have ever had. Barely able to understand and constantly mixes up words during complex subjects. Be sure to double check any written portions of tests because she cannot understand even the slightest error. Would not recommend, unsure why the rating was so high.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Looking back on this class, Adina was one of the best teachers I had at Santa Clara across all disciplines. Her genuine passion for her students and subject matter helped keep me engaged in the class. I highly recommend all students, econ or other major, to take her class because you will learn lots of valuable things.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Adina is an amazing professor for Econ 3. I took it as a junior after going abroad fall semester. She used real life explanations and examples, some of which I had seen while abroad (think Eurozone). I\'d definitely take her class again!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: This is the FIRST TIME ever I post things on the site. I have to say that Prof. Ardelean is the BEST teacher I ever have. She\'s helpful and has a great teaching style. If you come to class regularly, do the works, you will ace the class. The test could be a bit unexpected, but you\'ll be fine, as long as you understand the materials thoroughly

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: AMAZING professor! She made me love Econ and kept the class really interesting and relevant. She gives you practice midterms that really help you study for tests. Highly recommend!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great professor! As long as you understand all the example tests she puts up for the midterms and finals, you will do well!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Passionate about subject. Cares about students. Helpful in every regard. Hotness pepper. Everything anyone could want huh?

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Good class. Your average Econ class, fairly easy if you can wrap your head around the concepts. 2 midterms + final and 4 psets for the quarter. Good professor. Recommend.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great professor. It\'s basically like Dora the Explorer grows up gets HOT and teaches economics... well! I found myself always interested in the class and fully engaged! She\'s great at explaining concepts and a fun person to have as a teacher in general.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Absolutely loved her teaching style. Super helpful during office hours. She gives a lot of examples that will be in the midterms and final exam.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Best professor I\'ve had so far. I honestly hate econ but she made the subject more interesting and easier to understand. Not an easy class but manageable. She\'s a nice person in general too.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Prof Ardelean is AMAZING. The material is the hardest i have taken so far. However, she makes it so much fun! She prints out notes for you so don\'t even buy the textbook. She gives really fun application problems. If you\'re like me, you will have to study a ton to comprehend the material but its worth it. Take her if you can! I absolutely LOVE her

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I took her for Econ 1 and deliberately for Econ 3. She is so nice and always explains patiently. Professor Ardelean is very understanding. Her class is not an automatic "easy A" class, but it\'s definitely not radically time-consuming. Moderate amount of studying will suffice. you will really enjoy her class!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: love her! best teacher i\'ve had at santa clara. she explains everything so well that the tests seem super easy. she makes econ. exciting and you won\'t ever even consider skipping class

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: AWESOME teacher

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great teacher. Really knows her stuff. Willing to always help you, and gives so many practice problems and practice exam that you are more prepared for the final than you ever thought possible. AMAZING instructor.

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: I absolutely adore her!!!!! She is seriously the nicest teacher I have ever and is always willing to help you with everything!! Her practice exams are identical to the exams and she lets you use an entire sheet of notes. Don\'t buy the book, you have to buy the electronic one from aplia which saves you a ton of money.. take her if you can!!!!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great Teacher! Learned a lot! If coming to class isn\'t your thing take her. But if you do come to class she does know her stuff! Very accommodating and understanding. Good stuff. Highly recommended. Better than the rest!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Excellent Econ Prof! Love her! Before, I had no interest in it. Thanks to her, I\'m majoring in Econ! 1 Midterm. 1 Final. Prepares you well: Sample Midterm, 100+ MC Practice Q\'s. Very willing to help and explain if you don\'t understand! Take her!

tag_professor: TEST HEAVY (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: One of my favorite teachers so far at Santa Clara! Extremely clear and straightfoward. Easy to get a\'s on her tests if you go to class and do the practice problems, the reading helped me too but was not completely necessary. Would definitely take her class again given the chance!
